text: "Sailing" is a 1980 song by Christopher Cross. It is the second single from his debut studio album Christopher Cross. It topped the single charts in both the United States and Canada and made number 8 in New Zealand and number 48 in the United Kingdom. It won 3 Grammy Awards in 1981. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Christopher Cross songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Sailing (Christopher Cross song)
